verses.verse: We then <S%G1161><s%> that are strong <S%G1415><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to bear <S%G941><s%> the infirmities <S%G771><s%> of the weak, <S%G102><s%> and not to please <S%G700><s%> ourselves. <S%G1438><s%>
Let every <S%G1538><s%> one of us please <S%G700><s%> his neighbor <S%G4139><s%> for his good <S%G18><s%> to edification. <S%G3619><s%>

For even <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> not himself; <S%G1438><s%> but, as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> The reproaches <S%G3679><s%> of them that reproached <S%G3679><s%> you fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> me.

For whatever <S%G3745><s%> things were written <S%G4270><s%> aforetime <S%G4270><s%> were written <S%G4270><s%> for our learning, <S%G1319><s%> that we through <S%G1223><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and comfort <S%G3874><s%> of the scriptures <S%G1124><s%> might have <S%G2192><s%> hope. <S%G1680><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of patience <S%G5281><s%> and consolation <S%G3874><s%> grant <S%G1325><s%> you to be like minded <S%G3588><s%> one <S%G240><s%> toward <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G240><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

That you may with one <S%G3661><s%> mind <S%G3661><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> you one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G4355><s%> us to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was a minister <S%G1249><s%> of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> for the truth <S%G225><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> to confirm <S%G950><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> made to the fathers: <S%G3962><s%>

And that the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for his mercy; <S%G1656><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> I will confess <S%G1843><s%> to you among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and sing <S%G5567><s%> to your name. <S%G3686><s%>
And again <S%G3825><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> Rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> you Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> with his people. <S%G2992><s%>
And again, <S%G3825><s%> Praise <S%G134><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> you Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%> and laud <S%G1867><s%> him, all <S%G3956><s%> you people. <S%G2992><s%>

And again, <S%G3825><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> There shall be a root <S%G4491><s%> of Jesse, <S%G2421><s%> and he that shall rise <S%G450><s%> to reign <S%G757><s%> over the Gentiles; <S%G1484><s%> in him shall the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> trust. <S%G1679><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> fill <S%G4137><s%> you with all <S%G3956><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> in believing, <S%G4100><s%> that you may abound <S%G4052><s%> in hope, <S%G1680><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And I myself also <S%G2532><s%> am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> of you, my brothers, <S%G80><s%> that you also <S%G2532><s%> are full <S%G3324><s%> of goodness, <S%G19><s%> filled <S%G4137><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to admonish <S%G3560><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

Nevertheless, <S%G1161><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> the more <S%G5112><s%> boldly <S%G5112><s%> to you in some <S%G575><s%> <S%G3313><s%> sort, <S%G3313><s%> as putting <S%G1878><s%> you in mind, <S%G1878><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is given <S%G1325><s%> to me of God, <S%G2316><s%>

That I should be the minister <S%G3011><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> ministering <S%G2418><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that the offering <S%G4376><s%> up of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might be acceptable, <S%G2144><s%> being sanctified <S%G37><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

I have <S%G2192><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whereof I may glory <S%G2746><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in those <S%G3588><s%> things which pertain to God. <S%G2316><s%>

For I will not dare <S%G5111><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> of any <S%G5100><s%> of those things which <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> has not worked <S%G2716><s%> by me, to make <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> obedient, <S%G5218><s%> by word <S%G3056><s%> and deed, <S%G2041><s%>

Through <S%G1722><s%> mighty <S%G1411><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> by the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that from Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and round <S%G2943><s%> about <S%G2945><s%> to Illyricum, <S%G2437><s%> I have fully <S%G4137><s%> preached <S%G4137><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Yes, <S%G235><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> have I strived <S%G5389><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> not where <S%G3699><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was named, <S%G3687><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should build <S%G3618><s%> on another <S%G245><s%> man's <S%G245><s%> foundation: <S%G2310><s%>
But as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> To whom <S%G3739><s%> he was not spoken <S%G312><s%> of, they shall see: <S%G3700><s%> and they that have not heard <S%G191><s%> shall understand. <S%G4920><s%>
For which <S%G1352><s%> cause <S%G1352><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I have been much <S%G5248><s%> hindered <S%G1465><s%> from coming <S%G2064><s%> to you.

But now <S%G3570><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> more <S%G2001><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> in these <S%G5125><s%> parts, <S%G2824><s%> and having <S%G2192><s%> a great <S%G1974><s%> desire <S%G1974><s%> these many <S%G4183><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you;

Whenever <S%G5613><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I take my journey <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Spain, <S%G4681><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you: for I trust <S%G1679><s%> to see <S%G2300><s%> you in my journey, <S%G1279><s%> and to be brought <S%G4311><s%> on my way <S%G4311><s%> thitherward <S%G1563><s%> by you, if <S%G1437><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> I be somewhat <S%G1705><s%> filled <S%G1705><s%> with your <S%G5216><s%> company.
But now <S%G3570><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> to minister <S%G1247><s%> to the saints. <S%G40><s%>

For it has pleased <S%G2106><s%> them of Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia <S%G882><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> contribution <S%G2842><s%> for the poor <S%G4434><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

It has pleased <S%G2106><s%> them truly; <S%G1063><s%> and their debtors <S%G3781><s%> they are. For if <S%G1487><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> have been made <S%G2841><s%> partakers <S%G2841><s%> of their spiritual <S%G4152><s%> things, their duty <S%G3784><s%> is also <S%G2532><s%> to minister <S%G3008><s%> to them in carnal <S%G4559><s%> things.

When therefore <S%G3767><s%> I have performed <S%G2005><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and have sealed <S%G4972><s%> to them this <S%G5126><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> I will come <S%G565><s%> by you into <S%G1519><s%> Spain. <S%G4681><s%>

And I am sure <S%G1492><s%> that, when I come <S%G2064><s%> to you, I shall come <S%G2064><s%> in the fullness <S%G4138><s%> of the blessing <S%G2129><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ's <S%G5547><s%> sake, and for the love <S%G26><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> that you strive <S%G4865><s%> together <S%G4865><s%> with me in your <S%G3588><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> for me;

That I may be delivered <S%G4506><s%> from them that do not believe <S%G544><s%> in Judaea; <S%G2449><s%> and that my service <S%G1248><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> I have for Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> may be accepted <S%G2144><s%> of the saints; <S%G40><s%>
That I may come <S%G2064><s%> to you with joy <S%G5479><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and may with you be refreshed. <S%G4875><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
